Assuming Flag is a raw string

giventext

00100000001010100010011100100001001111010011111000101001001101000001100100110110001100110011001000110101000110010011001000101110001000110001100100100000001100110010100000011001001011110010100000011001001000000011001100101000001000100010011100101011001000110010100000110010001001110010101000111011

encoder

01000110010001100100011001000110

final(flag)

011111100101011010100000

Assuming Flag is in Base64

encoder
010111100111110010000111

og text
0010000000101010001001110010000100111101001
final (flag)
011111100101011010100000
